headline.main: NAVAL TRANSPORTS STAB IN SOLOMONS; Daring Service Has Reinforced Our Troops Under Fire, Shot Japanese Out of Skies WILL O' THE WISP IN PERILS Once Ships Shed Warship Cover to Send It Against Foe and Helped Win Sea Battle

lead_paragraph: AT A SOUTH PACIFIC BASE, Dec. 30 (Delayed) -- Back of our conquest of the Southern Solomons are tremendous achievements of the Naval Transport Service. Month after month vessels of this service manned by naval personnel have carried men and supplies that have steadily sewn up the position on Guadalcanal.
abstract: fliers, Wake Is; naval officers, Solomon Islands and submarine battles
